Description:
Administrative shares are hidden network shares created by Microsoft Windows NT operating systems that grant system administrators remote access to every disk volume on a network-connected system

Author: frack113
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Disable Administrative Share Creation at Startup
Query: sourcetype like 'windows-%' eql select * from _source_ where target_object like '%\services\lanmanserver\parameters\%' and (target_object like '%\autosharewks' or target_object like '%\autoshareserver') and details = 'dword (0x00000000)'
